name: Redesign Challenge
description: One of the ways I like to level up my design skills is by redesigning websites that I think could be improved. In this challenge I gave 3 different website a refresh.

name: Nouns Esports
description: Driving innovation at the intersection of web3 and gaming. Nouns is a decentralized esports organization where anyone, anywhere can contribute towards its growth and success!

name: Game Engine
description: When building my portfolio I wanted to include four different 2D games. When developing Asteroids I quickly realized that I was repeating a lot of code and that I should create a standard foundation for each game.
